ncrsDetermination.dwc:vernacularName: BASIC VOLCANIC ROCK WITH BLUE AMPHIBOLE
GREISEN WITH ARSENOPYRITE, CASSITERITE, PYRITE AND QUARTZ
ARSENOPYRITE, CASSITERITE, BERYL AND QUARTZ ON GREISEN
BLUE GRANITE PEGMATITE IN CASTRO DAIRE GRANITE
FINE MEDIUM GRANULAR TWOMICA GRANITE (SAO PEDRO DO SUL)
CONTACT BIOTITE MICROCLINE GNEISS AND MICA POOR MICROCLINE GNEISS
